# ContractDeployer.deployNFTCollection property

Deploys an NFT Collection contract

## Example

```javascript
const contractAddress = await sdk.deployer.deployNFTCollection({
  name: "My Collection",
  primary_sale_recipient: "your-address",
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
deployNFTCollection: {
        (metadata: NFTContractDeployMetadata): Promise<string>;
        prepare: (metadata: NFTContractDeployMetadata) => Promise<DeployTransaction>;
    };
```

## Remarks

Deploys an NFT Collection contract and returns the address of the deployed contract
